title: StockCorrections
description: Contains details on the stock correction

quantity.description: The quantity of stock to be adjusted

reasonCode.description: Reason code for the stock correction. Indicates why the stock quantity needs adjustment.

comment.description: Additional remarks or notes related to the stock correction.

serialNumber.description: The serial number of the specific stock item being corrected

batchNumber.description: The batch number of the specific stock item being corrected

businessPartnerId.description: The unique identifier for the business partner
